mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_VISUAL_ITEMS (VISUAL_SEQ, MOVIE_INFO_SEQ, MOVIE_STILLCUT) VALUES (MOVIE_VISUAL_ITEMS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MOVIE_INFO_SEQ}, #{MOVIE_STILLCUT})
INSERT INTO MOVIE_VISUAL_ITEMS (VISUAL_SEQ, MOVIE_INFO_SEQ, MOVIE_TRAILER) VALUES (MOVIE_VISUAL_ITEMS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MOVIE_INFO_SEQ}, #{MOVIE_TRAILER})
